title: SWEETS hotel
description: Creation of the website of a new boutique hotel concept in Amsterdam.
longDescription: SWEETS hotel is a new hotel concept in Amsterdam which consists of 28 different bridge houses, scattered across the city. The bridge houses were built in the 17th century to control the city's waterways and are now converted into hotel suites. The website is a key element of the brand identity. It is designed to be a digital experience that reflects the unique character of the hotel. I was in charge of overseeing the project from the initial concept to the final delivery. I worked closely with the design and development teams to ensure the project was delivered on time and on budget.

title: Acme
description: Set-up of dynamic dashboard for invoicing SaaS.
longDescription: Acme is a SaaS that helps freelancers and small businesses manage their invoices. I was in charge of the front-end development of the dashboard. The dashboard is built with React and Next.js. The UI is designed with Tailwind CSS. The project is hosted on Vercel.

title: Kasa
description: Website development for a housing company.
longDescription: Kasa is a housing company that offers furnished apartments for rent. I was in charge of the front-end development of the website, which is built using React.

title: Bouygues Telecom
description: Set-up of the new design system.
longDescription: In 2021 Bouyguyes Telecom launched a new graphic identity, developed by BETC Paris. As part of this project, I was in charge of setting up the new digital design system, making sure to adapt and develop new components and layouts to update the client's digital touchpoints.

title: Martell
description: Management of the new Martell website.
longDescription: Martell is one of the oldest cognac houses, yet a very innovative brand. In 2020, the brand launched a new website. Working in close collaboration with Unlikely Studio, I was in charge of overseeing its maintenance and evolution, including a roll-out to 28 countries and the development of new features.

title: Alexandre Humbert
description: Design of Alexandre's new portfolio website.
longDescription: I had the opportunity to help Alexandre Humbert design his new portfolio website. Alexandre is a French videographer, working with cultural insitutions and museums. The website is designed to showcase his work in a simple and elegant way.

title: Snipes
description: Management of the brand hubs on Snipes global platform.
longDescription: Snipes is a German streetwear retailer. I was in charge of managing the brand hubs on the Snipes global platform. This included the development of new features, the roll-out of new countries and the maintenance of the existing platform.

title: Booki
description: Website development for a property rental company.
longDescription: Booki is a property rental company. I was in charge of the front-end development of the website, which was done with vanilla CSS.
